backend/main.mo: Defines core backend types for policies, users, products, orders, educational content, payouts, and includes comparison utilities and storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent changes for each major frontend file.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint setting global metadata, branding, PWA manifest link, and the root app mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, colors, screenshots, and metadata for ANC Marketplace.
frontend/public/policies/marketplace-pol: Marketplace policy detailing platform rules, fees, user responsibilities, prohibited activities, and liability limits.
Privacy policy outlining data collection, usage, security, user rights, and contact information.
Details return eligibility, non-returnable items, return steps, shipping cost rules, refund timelines, and handling of damaged items and restocking fees.
frontend/public/policies/shipping-policy: Explains shipping methods, costs, processing times, tracking, delivery limits, international rules, and lost or damaged package procedures.
frontend/public/policies/terms-and-condi: Outlines user responsibilities, marketplace rules, payment terms, liability limits, dispute processes, and conditions for account termination.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the application's route tree and query client, registering all major pages such as blogs, FAQs, policies, and settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Manages assistant knowledge entries with search, add, edit, and category handling, including loading and error states.
Displays unanswered user questions and allows converting them into knowledge base entries, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Fetches and displays marketplace roadmap data with progress info, handling loading, errors, and manual refresh.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Shows user role counts for admins, users, and guests, with loading and permission-aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Chat UI with text and voice input, handling speech recognition, TTS, modes, and message flow.
Floating button and panel wrapper that toggles and displays the assistant chat panel.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with legal links, contact information, accepted payment icons, and partner sections.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main page layout including header navigation, login/logout handling, banner, voice settings provider, and footer.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyD: Loads and renders markdown policy content with metadata display and signature status checks.
frontend/src/components/policies/PolicyS: Interface to review, accept, and digitally sign required policies with signature input and submission.
frontend/src/components/policies/Require: Gate component that blocks access until all required policies are signed, showing alerts when needed.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Displays a cookie consent banner with accept/reject options and persists the user’s choice.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Implements a profile setup form that saves user info via API and shows success or error messages.
frontend/src/components/RouterErrorScree: Displays a generic routing error screen with options to refresh the page or navigate home.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Catches runtime and unhandled promise errors and shows an error UI with optional details and a refresh button.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: Modal requiring a checkbox and simple math challenge to verify human interaction before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Displays a lesson’s details including video, HTML content, and navigation options.
frontend/src/contexts/VoiceSettingsConte: Provides a context combining microphone permission state and voice preference settings, exposing controls for requesting mic access and toggling voice features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Wraps a mutation that sends a question and category to the backend assistant via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, logout, and status tracking through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophonePermissi: Tracks microphone permission status, checks browser support, and provides functions to request or retry permission.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageActivity.ts: Detects whether the page is active based on visibility and focus events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many query and mutation hooks using the actor to fetch and update user roles, admin data, policies, and related backend resources.
Provides speech recognition control, tracking transcripts, errors, and auto-restart behavior when supported and permitted.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Controls speech synthesis, exposing speak, stop, and cancel functions with state for speaking status and message tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoicePreferences.t: Manages voice-related user preferences stored in localStorage, with setters for activation and spoken replies.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables for light/dark themes, global base styles, and animations for logo and voice UI states.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Handles reading, writing, and checking cookie consent state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Manages a 30‑minute human verification flag stored in sessionStorage with TTL handling.
frontend/src/lib/policies.ts: Provides typed metadata for site policies and exports all policy configurations as an array.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Centralizes pricing model text and subscription details used across the UI.
frontend/src/lib/voice/browserVoice.ts: Provides feature detection and factories for Web Speech API recognition and speech synthesis controllers.
Stores and retrieves user voice feature preferences with versioned localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Renders a customer‑facing blog list with cards, categories, and navigation to posts.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Displays individual blog post content using route params and predefined post data.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Renders a detailed FAQ page using collapsible sections and centralized pricing copy.
Displays a customer messages page with a login check and placeholder inbox UI indicating messaging is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Shows a purchase history page gated by login, displaying a placeholder for future order tracking features.
Settings page requiring login, providing voice settings controls, mic permission handling, and policy signatures.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showcasing marketplace features, hero section, and navigation to various service areas.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePolicyPage: Renders the marketplace-wide policy document using PolicyDocument.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI DSS compliance certificate details with view/download options and security information.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy document via PolicyDocument.
frontend/src/pages/ReturnsPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the returns policy document via PolicyDocument.
frontend/src/pages/SellerPayoutsPage.tsx: Seller payouts dashboard handling payout profiles, account numbers, and debit/credit card requests with form interactions.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Renders a blog listing page showing business-related posts with categories, excerpts, and navigation.
Displays a full blog post based on route params, pulling detailed content from a local posts map.
Provides an FAQ section for sellers and businesses using accordion components.
frontend/src/pages/ShippingPolicyPage.ts: Renders the shipping policy document via a shared PolicyDocument component.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder page for a future startup dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the store builder feature.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for the main store interface.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Renders the terms and conditions document via PolicyDocument.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines frontend TypeScript types for users, products, orders, startup program data, integrations, and store builder configs.
frontend/src/types/speech.d.ts: Adds TypeScript definitions for the Web Speech API, including SpeechRecognition types.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including branding notes, existing feature updates, and pending feature requests around seller payouts and financial tools. Contains metadata, architectural notes, and no known issues.
